resources.string:
Madison BusRadar 
1.0.13


Copyright © 2010 Aleksandr Dobkin, Michael Choi, and Christopher Mills. All rights reserved. 

Route paths and bus stop locations are accurate as of October 2010. Bus arrival estimates and bus locations are obtained on demand from the Madison Metro website. We assume no responsibility for this information. 

The Priority R-Tree implementation is based on PRTree © 2008 Robert Olofsson. 

BusRadar is in not produced by or in any way affiliated with Madison Metro Transit. 

Thank you, and we hope that you enjoy your BusRadar experience! 

Visit us online at busradarapp.com and on Twitter @busradar. Feedbacks & Fix requests welcomed. support@busradarapp.com
